short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To prevent spoilers on how long a showmatch lasts. This extension can hide the elapsed time, scrub bar and comments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're sick of showmatches being ruined by the YouTube scrubber and timer, or even comments, you can now remove them! This extension adds 2 checkboxes next to your like button "Hide time" and "Hide comments". They do exactly what you expect them to do.

Enjoy your spoiler free showmatch.
